data.text: Yave weti yala, bika ntoto wuyangalala.
Miongo misiuta banga mafuta momo beti vinda mu bikundu va ntuala Yave,
Babo bobo bambuongiminanga zimfikula beti fua tsoni ;
Sioni weti wa ayi weti mona khini
Bila ngeyo Yave, widi Nzambi yizangama va ntoto wumvimba.
Bika babo beti zola Yave, balenda mambimbi.
Kiezila kieti totuka mu diambu di batu basonga
Bika lumona khini mu Yave, beno luidi basonga
